replies.body: In South Africa we buy the cows, then we have a special machine we attatch to its udders to milk it and the we just take the carton off of its belly once it's done milking and replace it so more milk can fill. Once we're done with the cow we kill it and cook it and have a "braai" also known as a barbeque.

replies.body: I have to admit that is kinda weird. But over in New Zealand, you just grab a bottle go to your nearest milk stand and fill her up, we have a few of those in my city and it is one of the most pure and healthy milk you can get in the world. And you can get bottled milk but it is easier just to get your own bottle.
